mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_ID, BOOK_CATEGORY_ID, BOOK_NAME, BOOK_STOCK, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_HITS, BOOK_SELLCOUNT, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_CONTENTS, BOOK_DETAIL_IMAGE, BOOK_LIST_IMAGE,DATE_FORMAT(BOOK_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') "bookDate", BOOK_TRANSLATOR FROM BK_BOOK WHERE BOOK_ID = #{bookId}

SELECT P_COMMENT_ID "pCommentId", P_COMMENT_USER_ID "pCommentUserId", P_COMMENT_LATTER_PART "pCommentLatterPart", P_COMMENT_POINT "pCommentPoint", DATE_FORMAT(P_COMMENT_REGISTRATION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') "pCommentRegistrationDate" FROM BK_PRODUCT_COMMENT WHERE P_COMMENT_BOOK_ID = #{bookId} ORDER BY P_COMMENT_REGISTRATION_DATE DESC

SELECT BOOK_ID, BOOK_CATEGORY_ID, BOOK_NAME, BOOK_STOCK, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_HITS, BOOK_SELLCOUNT, BOOK_WRITER, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_CONTENTS, BOOK_DETAIL_IMAGE, BOOK_LIST_IMAGE,DATE_FORMAT(BOOK_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') "bookDate", BOOK_TRANSLATOR FROM BK_BOOK WHERE BOOK_CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
SELECT BOOK_NAME , BOOK_PRICE , BOOK_LIST_IMAGE ,BOOK_ID , BOOK_HITS FROM BK_BOOK ORDER BY BOOK_HITS DESC limit 6
